entries.title: How to screen-mirror an iPhone to a Samsung TV
entries.description: Want to show your friends and family what's on your iPhone but the screen is too small? Learn how to mirror your Apple device's screen on a Samsung TV.

entries.title: How to upgrade Opera connections from HTTP to HTTPS
entries.description: To keep your browser navigation as safe as possible, you should force connections to use HTTPS. Find out how to enable this feature in the Opera browser.

entries.title: I started my own Mastodon server on a Raspberry Pi. Here's what I learned
entries.description: If you're thinking about joining Mastodon, running your own server isn't that hard. You just need some patience and the right equipment.

entries.title: Friendly reminder: Apple's Dark Sky weather app will stop working on Jan. 1
entries.description: Apple is shutting down Dark Sky, one of the best weather apps that's ever existed. Is it time to start using Apple's Weather app?

entries.title: How to add Send Later functionality to Thunderbird
entries.description: Most modern email clients have Send Later functionality already built into them. Find out how to add it to the open-source Thunderbird app.

entries.title: The 5 best VPNs for school of 2023
entries.description: The best VPN for school will protect your browsing activity so you can focus on schoolwork. We researched the best VPNs for school based on bandwidth, security, and price.

entries.title: The ABCs of tech opportunities in the year ahead: AI, B2B, and CX
entries.description: Regardless of what the economy does, we still have a 'a small percentage of the workforce holding up a massive B2B technology software industry.'

entries.title: The best tech products, devices, and gadgets of 2022
entries.description: Trying to find the absolute best tech products of 2022? From the iPhone 14 Pro Max to the Kindle Scribe to the Oura Ring Gen 3 Horizon, here are ZDNET's top gadgets of the year.

entries.title: How to change the voice in Waze
entries.description: With the holidays approaching, you may be planning one or two road trips, so why not make them more fun with a new Waze navigation voice?

entries.title: Chromebook vs laptop: Which one best fits your needs?
entries.description: There are real differences that can make these two types of portable computer ideal or terrible for each user. Let's take a look at what makes Chromebooks different from other laptops, which would work better for you, and some recommendations.

entries.title: Apple's next iPhone SE might be delayed, says industry analyst
entries.description: The challenge of the iPhone SE 4's redesign might be enough of a reason for Apple to even do away with its entry-level phone entirely, according to an analyst.

entries.title: 3 free Google Chrome extensions to help me waste less time in 2023
entries.description: I spend a lot of time in front of a Google Chrome browser. And if I'm being honest, I waste a lot of time because I'm in front of Google Chrome. Here's how I plan to claw back some of that time.

entries.title: The 14 best web hosting services of 2023
entries.description: Fast speeds and loads of content are essential for building a powerful website. We compared features like cPanel, SSL, SSH, backups, and customer support to find the best web hosting services.

entries.title: The 5 best robot litter boxes of 2023
entries.description: Take the fuss out of caring for your feline friend with the best robot litter boxes, designed to simplify life and keep your home cleaner than ever.

entries.title: How to add your HomePod to the Home app and Wi-Fi
entries.description: Apple's Home app is a great controller for all compatible smart home devices, if you have a HomePod, HomePod Mini, or Apple TV 4K to use as a hub. We'll walk you through adding a HomePod to the Home app and getting connected to Wi-Fi.

entries.title: Immersive AR for consumers is 'five or so' years away, says Magic Leap CEO
entries.description: Magic Leap is seeing commercial success with its enterprise augmented reality headset, but it will take years to get electronics shrunk down into a glasses-like form factor that consumers will want to use.

entries.title: This 3D printing system converts waste sawdust into stunning wooden lamps and guitars
entries.description: Desktop Metal's sawdust-printing outfit allows individual designers and large manufacturers to print elaborate wooden objects.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams Premium preview is now ready to test, and these are the features coming
entries.description: The Microsoft Teams Premium preview is now available ahead of general availability in February 2023.

entries.title: Singtel inks first data centre development pact in Indonesia
entries.description: Singapore telco ropes in Indonesian partners Telkom and Medco Power to mark its first data centre project in the Asean market, where it hopes to tap growing demand for digital and cloud services.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi 5? Don't expect one to arrive in 2023, and here's why
entries.description: Raspberry Pi will not release a Pi 5 in 2023, although that doesn't mean there won't be any work done on it.

entries.title: No, there won't be a Raspberry Pi 5 in 2023 - and here's why
entries.description: Raspberry Pi will not release a Pi 5 in 2023, although that doesn't mean there won't be any work done on it.

entries.title: Australia throws out Telstra, TPG network-sharing deal
entries.description: Nation's competition watchdog says the two telcos' pact to share network infrastructures in some parts of Australia will likely lead to less competition and leave mobile users worse off--a point which TPG has rebuffed.

entries.title: Buffalo 1TB portable SSD just dropped to less than $70 on Amazon
entries.description: If you need extra storage space for your TV shows, movies, games, music, or work files, we have you covered with this great deal on a 1TB drive.

entries.title: Buffalo 1TB portable SSD just dropped to less than $70 on Amazon
entries.description: If you need extra storage space for your TV shows, movies, games, music, or work files, we have you covered with this great deal on a 1TB drive.

entries.title: 19 laptops that make great gifts in 2022
entries.description: I found the best laptops to give as gifts this holiday season so you can focus on enjoying family rather than panicking about shopping.

entries.title: Samsung develops '12nm' DDR5 DRAM as CPU DDR5 support widens
entries.description: The tech giant's latest DRAM boasts a top speed of 7.2Gbps, which means it can process 60GB per second.
